experiences.title: Videogame App (SPA)
experiences.subtitle: Soy HENRY
workDescription: Web application that allows viewing, filtering and searching by different criteria of different video games called through an API external (www.api.rawg.io).
Realization of REST Services, ORM with Sequalize and pure CSS design.
Technologies used: HTML 5, CSS, JavaScript, ECMAScript, React-Redux, NodeJS, Express, PostgreSQL.
